column1: 02:22|twenty-two minutes past two|After two more visits
column2: the most celebrated practitioner told Popanilla that his disorder was ‘unquestionably nervous;’ that he had over-excited himself by talking too much; that in future he must count five between each word he uttered
column5: never stay at an evening party on any consideration later than twenty-two minutes past two
column6: and never be induced by any persuasion to dine out more than once on the same day.|The Voyage of Captain Popanilla|Benjamin Disraeli

column1: 02:22|2:22 A.M.|Abruptly her stomach growled. She had been too keyed up to eat very much after the accident
column2:
and now hunger pangs her in in earnest.
She glanced at the clock again.
2:22 A.M.|Code Name: Princess|Christina Skye
